Pre-Game Insights: South Africa captain Temba Bavuma won the toss and elected to field first in the fourth T20I against India.
India needs to perform well as a team to secure a series win at home.
South Africa aims to make a comeback in this match and clinch the series.
Rishabh Pant said they are not thinking this is a must-win game but focusing on their process.
South Africa has a couple of forced changes with Rabada, Parnell, and Reeza Hendricks missing due to injuries, while Quinton de Kock and Marco Jansen have returned.
